title: Enables employees to receive electronic confirmation of direct deposit in lieu of paper pay stubs
summary: Enables employees to receive electronic confirmation of direct deposit in lieu of paper pay stubs; authorizes rules and regulations by the comptroller for electronic confirmation system; requires notification of such system in each employee's paper pay stub.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to providing the option to employees of electronic confirmation of direct deposit in lieu of paper pay stubs
